List of releases of Soho¶

Soho 0.8 (2012-06-18)¶

Major rewrite. Old Soho projects should be easily moved to the new format (see documentation).

Soho 0.7 (2008-02-17)¶

First public release. Note that it was registered in PyPI as “soho” (with a lowercase “s”).
